website_summaries.verdict: The Shark is a very good vacuum with solid construction and intuitive design. Other models may have performed better, but none of them can match this sweeper's value for the price.
pros: The Shark Rotator Pro Lift-Away is a veritable master of versatility
It comes with so many attachments and accessories that you are pretty much guaranteed to have the right brush for the job at hand
cons: It didn't lead during performance testing
Then again, it costs $450 less than some of its competition -- and in many cases the results were only marginally worse

customer_reviews.title: Its not a Dyson at all
customer_reviews.text: It's not a Dyson. Its terrible on hard floors. A Dyson will visibly suck the debris towards it. This Shark has to roll over the debris and even then some debris is left behind. The lighted head was cool, the lift off canister was cool. The performance was very disappointing. Get a refurbished Dyson for just a little more $ and it will bring you for satisfaction for YEARS. We learned our lesson with this and immediately bought another Dyson after this return, after our first refurbished Dyson finally lost suction after 13 years .
customer_reviews.author: Sam Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best for dust and animal hair.
customer_reviews.text: Given all the dog and cat hair,this item gets a lot of work. The motor seems larger and stronger than our older version.Worksvery well and takes out a lot of the animal hairs. Easy to clean and to use as well.I like the light on the end which shows the extra dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Delzen

customer_reviews.title: Light and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum!! It is scary how much dog hair it picks up, makes me feel like my house was not clean before. The Shark brand came highly recommended by a cleaning professional and I am not disappointed. It is very light weight and easy to use on any surface.
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum! We have been using the same hoover for almost five years now and I thought it did an acceptable job. When the suction finally died I tried to fix it but found the parts were just as expensive as a new vacuum. While I was at my mother's house I tried her new Shark. I was in love instantly so I purchased this item straight from the Amazon app. I like how light it is and how tall the handle is. I am quite grateful for the full 30 foot cord as it makes cleaning the house so much simple because I'm not constantly changing outlets.
customer_reviews.author: The Jake

customer_reviews.title: Ugh...so disappointing.  Keeps clogging up
customer_reviews.text: We had such high hopes for this product. It started out great....but within a month or two...constant clogging. It is so jammed up now there is no suction in the hose -- the clog is near the handle where the flex hose connects with the rigid handle. We have no pets. No excessive dirt or dust build up. Our home is pretty status quo. Mostly hardwood floors. Some larger area rugs and carpet on the stairs. This vacuum is not cheap. Does not meet expectations and does not deliver on its promises.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both have used the vacuum. I would rate it 5 stars because of the versatility and the way it sucks. My wife is a petite senior citizen. She thinks the way it cleans is fantastic, but rates it only 4 stars because of it weight. She has a hard time pushing a full sized vacuum on shag carpeting. Hmmmm. . . . I guess I need to step up to the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Russ B

customer_reviews.title: Wow It's Amazing in every way!!!
customer_reviews.text: Going on three years with this vacuum, it is everything it says it is and more! Great Suction, and durability, and I love how it has options to detach it from the base with the wand! Super convenient Vacuum and picks up ANYTHING!!!! Even a bowling ball! lol
customer_reviews.author: Lexus Riggins

customer_reviews.title: Unit was a bit larger than expected from the site but did work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend whose previous Shark NV500 died. She initially found the unit she received was a bit heavier than the one she'd had previously and contacted the seller. They were eventually willing to pick up the unit and accept it for a full return but by this time, she needed the vacuum too badly to let it go and return it.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Warranty doesn’t cover the bottom attachment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the shark for five months worked great until the swivel drive went out quit working so the swivel and self-propelled did not work, called the manufacture (shark) and that is not covered under the warranty so I had to fork out $90 plus shipping to have a new bottom piece , This was a major component to the vacuum so I didn’t understand why it wasn’t covered under warranty
customer_reviews.author: deborah pillow

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy for my cleaning business. I’m a tall lady and shark vacuums fit my body type better.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria White Eagle

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, lightweight, turns into a canister if you want and great suction. This works even better than my Dyson animal the suction is unbelievable and you can even adjust it if you need to for more delicate items.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Costanza-Sheedy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best vacuum ever! I consider my house fairly clean and don't have a dog, but am always amazed at what comes up every time. I have recommended this vacuum to all of my friends and gave both my daughters one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cazier

customer_reviews.title: Equip was broken??
customer_reviews.text: The hose clamp, makes no sense. It is not the right part and/or came broken. I emailed a request for new part and rcv'd nothing. Not even a response!
customer_reviews.author: michele prochet

customer_reviews.title: The best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Shark Navigator Professional Rotar after using a Dyson Animal for the last 5 years. I have to say this is the best vacuum ever the Dyson doesn't even compare. The Shark was easy to assemble and I started vacuuming right away and I couldn't believe what my Dyson was leaving behind. I just wanted to keep vacuuming it was truly amazing! I am someone who vacuums everyday, I really thought I wouldn't see as much in the canister I was wrong. I think I emptied it 2 times on my livingroom alone. I like that it's quiet, easy to handle and I love all the attachments, very well designed. I would recommend this vacuum for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve ordered two now. One at home and one for the office. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: joni

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: time! Heavy. Suction is good, I have cats and it's good for fur . Nice and quiet too.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch vacuum at a great price
customer_reviews.text: After using the Shark and comparing it to a Lindhaus Healthcare Pro, against a Kirby, and a high-end Dyson, the Shark comes out on top on almost every comparison. Dollar for dollar the Shark literally blows away the competition. Ironically, you can buy several Sharks for the price of a Kirby, a Lindhaus, or even a comparably equipped Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Combs

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't have anything else...
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've used the Shark Rotator I wouldn't use anything else. It does a fantastic job with all the pet hair in our house, and it doesn't "poof" out dust like my other vacs do. I can dust first and then run the Shark, but with my other vacs I always had to run them first and dust last. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: serenity63379

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum I ever owned !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate...easy to clean...no smell what so ever...and does a super job...great price, fast shipping and backed by Amazon...cant go wrong with this product...
customer_reviews.author: TomB

customer_reviews.title: Nice vacuuum, but too top heavy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the performance but the design allows the vacuum to fall over too easy even when barely touched. If I had tried it before I bought it I would have bought a different manufacturer. The extension hose for the wand is a joke as it's length is not nearly enough to reach difficult places. I wish I would have bought a Dyson. This purchase wasn't about the cost of the vacuum, it was about the quality, and the Shark just doesn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best test it has ever had
customer_reviews.text: we use it in a construction job site location and have had many problems with dust during vacuuming - not with this one so far. Maybe the best test it has ever had, maybe Shark would like to use us in their infomercials??
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Bought used - but it looked brand new. It was delivered without an important piece but one phone call and the part was delivered as promised. Two reasons for a 4 star - the missing part and the vacuum is a little heavier than expected. Other than that the vacuum is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Price

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sweeper takes cleaning to a whole new level
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect and disconnect; no loss of suction; suction level adjustable; easy to empty and clean dust canister. I have had Sharp products in the past and they have always been very good, but this new Sharp product takes cleaning to a whole new level. If I were Dyson, I would be very worried about this new Sharp product. The Sharp Rotator product beats Dyson's top of the line at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: njedpx3

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the efficiency of this vacuum. It is a little heavier than I expected, but I don't mind that.
customer_reviews.author: obsue73

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the delivery and packaging
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the delivery and packaging. It was easy to put together and had descriptive buttons to operate and change from Vaccum, to floor piece, to canister lift-away . It has powered brushes so it runs itself when moving forward. It was more difficult when pulling backwards because I have a disability and the suction is powerful. I have had a problem using the wheeled base that holds the extra parts though. I would like to suggest including a longer extention piece for reaching higher window ledges or offering an option to purchase one at the time of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: RLG

customer_reviews.title: great vacume
customer_reviews.text: got this for the wife been bugging me about needing a good vacume I reserched for several weeks to pick best available and chose shark. A good choice
customer_reviews.author: John Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. It cleans better than any that I have owned before it. Also its design seems to have some actual thought put into it so that its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Best money spent ... for a vacuum
customer_reviews.text: After asking family and friends to rate their vacuums, and reading reviews here, and on consumer reports, I decided to go with my gut and purchase a Shark Navigator and could not be happier with my purchase. The vacuum came with attachments to make it easier to detail my car ... which I LOVE!! I find this particular vacuum easy to convert (from hardwood flooring, to carpet), light-weight, and quieter than a typical vacuum. I also like how easily this product breaks down for cleaning; the long cord is a bonus too. I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margot Shinn

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: Put it together without instructions. Everything clicked right in to place. Super easy to use and clean. Worked extremely well. When I took the can out to empty, it won't stand up on its own but, it's easy to prop against a wall.
customer_reviews.author: John F.

customer_reviews.title: Shark Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 or 6 vacuums that I have tried over the years and this is the best I have ever had. I have paid more and a lot less but this is worth every dime. Does a great job of picking up dirt and the 3 in 1 idea is fantastic. Great engineering and I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Hugh Woodrow

customer_reviews.title: vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all the attachments but really like the vacuum. Boy, does it pick up the dirt! It feels a little heavy to me and harder to move than my old vacuum. I can see why Dyson has the large ball to pivot on at the bottom, The Shark seems a little top heavy with the connection at the bottom. Otherwise I am very happy I got the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: ITS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: ITS DOES WHAT THE MAKER STATES ,IT WORKS GREAT,PICKS UP THE DIRT AND DOG FUR. I WOULD RECOMMEND TO ANYBODY TO GET ONE IF THEY NEEDY A VACUUM.
customer_reviews.author: DON BURNSIDE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Lightweight with a lot of suction and easy to go from upright to canister. It is easy on your back.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly! Floors feel so much cleaner on my bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S. Myers

customer_reviews.title: The Power of the Shark
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is very good one. Very powerful, not to heavy, but it's kinda hard to push across the carpet. It's hard because of the strong suction, so it's worth a little work out. My wife got rid of her regular vacuum, stick vac, and canister vac. This Shark does the job of all three, and does it much better. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wow! It really sucks, and that's a great thing for a vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? This is all you need from a vacuum cleaner. Easy to use, excellent features, great accessory tools. Exceeded expectations. Only time will tell if it maintains its suction power, which right now is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ron B

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I need to find someone locally that can clean it up for me however. There is a buildup of "stuff" in it for some reason that I can't get to. But it still SUCKS! LOL
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B

customer_reviews.title: I like the lift away function.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for the lift away function an it works very well. The most powerful suction comes from the wand function. The product works very well on hard surfaces and pulls dirt from deep within carpets. The smaller base is harder to push on carpets but the tight swivel action around corners makes it worth it. I really like the product. I need to try more attachments before I decide it I love it. It's loaded with attachments. It even has two bases.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline L Finney

customer_reviews.title: It's heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love the tools but it's heavier than my old sharp vac cleaner. I choose this instead of Dyson because it has a hypo=allergenic while the Dyson doesn't have.
customer_reviews.author: Jenalyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum does it all! The attachments are convenient ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does it all! The attachments are convenient. The rotator brush is powerful. I didn't believe the hype about the power of this sweeper but it is as fabulous as the reviews say.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Paxson

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ATTACHMENT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS LITTLE VACUUM, ONLY ATTACHMENT THAT I STILL NEED IS THE ANGLED DUSTING BRUSH. I TRIED CALLING SHARK DIRECTLY FOR IT, BUT THEY WILL ONLY SELL IT IN PACKAGE DEAL. MEANING I WOULD END UP WITH DUPLICATE ATTACHMENTS THAT I DO NOT NEED.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Peace

customer_reviews.title: We are several months in to owning and we LOVE it! It is so mobile
customer_reviews.text: We are several months in to owning and we LOVE it! It is so mobile, able to get in, around, and under. Easy to get out and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Adria Weber

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. I vacuum every day with pets in the home . Works well on hardwood and ceramic floors as well as carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really sucks... and that's a good thing! I hope you all have a really good sense of humor...
customer_reviews.author: j-dash

customer_reviews.title: arrived & works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. My last vac ws 30 years old, we'll see how long this lasts. Maybe outlast me!
customer_reviews.author: GERALD A LARSH

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money but does have cons.
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum works as advertised and maintains suction. My only gripes: - small container which increase the frequency of emptying - small and narrow brushroll which means smaller cleaning area. Not the size of your hoovers and bissel vacuums. - small length cord, wish it could have been longer. - if you use the wand with attachment, the handle provides for a unique holding position. not very ergonomic friendly and will start to wear your wrist out after some time. - the attachments are not "on-board" like your hoovers. if you can live with the above, then by all means, order. The vacuum does maintain suction and is easy to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: J.J.

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disgusted when I saw how much dirt and hair was ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually find vacuuming to be one of my hum drum daily chores, but today I got this vacuum and found myself actually smiling as I used it. I was a little disgusted when I saw how much dirt and hair was in my carpet. When I was done it looked as if my carpets were professionally cleaned. I highly reccommend it!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: This thing SUCKS - in a good way
customer_reviews.text: This thing SUCKS - in a good way! I've had a Dyson for years and after reading reviews on this vacuum, decided to get one. My Dyson never worked so well. It's easy to empty and switching from vacuuming the carpet to using the wand takes just the push of a button. And it's so much quieter than my last vacuum. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum cleaner is quiet and does everything it claims to do. I love how versatile it is and the attachments too! If you want a cleaner home, but this. It has lots of power and is easy to use. I like the fact you can turn off the brushes from rotating while you clean the stairs or furniture. I originally ordered from the Shark website, but it was out of stock and I was on a wait list. Amazon had my order here in five days! You can not beat that.
customer_reviews.author: FireLillyCreations

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just start by saying, This vacuum is so AWESOME! It really has major sucking power. I have 5 bunnies and 2 cats so anyone out there with animals knows how much hair can be accumulated. This vacuum picks the hair up like it's nothing. Also, I have a bad back and I would have to sit down after 5 min of vacuuming with my Bissell. The SHARK is very lightweight and I don't have to take breaks when using it. :) I definitely recommend this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

customer_reviews.title: ... the Shark a few days but it cleans much better than our previous vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We have only used the Shark a few days but it cleans much better than our previous vacuum. Using the Shark immediately after cleaning with the old vacuum it is amazing how much dirt was missed by the old vacuum. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: grolbiec

customer_reviews.title: The Best Vacuum I've Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum cleaner. I have a cat and a dog. The pet hair never clogs the vacuum. I also have wood floors throughout the main floor of my home. I will never own anything other than a Shark again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. May

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.text: After extended research I bought this vacuum. The reviews had been excellent. I owned a commercial Nobles machine for about 12 years. That vacuum doesn't begin to compare with the suction of this vacuum. The attachments are great on this Shark. It is very easy to switch from carpet to hard floor, easy to change from upright to long handled hose for high cobwebs, tops of curtains, etc.. As of yet I haven't used as a canister or used the mini attachments but expect the use will be as easy and user friendly as the rest of the vacuum. I would buy this Shark again and highly recommend it. (it is very simple to empty the the dust cup too).
customer_reviews.author: Huey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vacuum at a Great Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vacuum. It's much easier to navigate than my Dyson and at a fraction of the cost. When the brush roller is on, it actually pulls itself. I have 2 dogs so there's always a lot of hair. This unit does a great job. I'd say even better than the Dyson Animal.
customer_reviews.author: angie3556

customer_reviews.title: best vaccum ever
customer_reviews.text: i love my new shark rotator vaccum, it is light weight, easy to use, all the attachments work perfectly for my home. I highly recommend it. I bought 2 sharks for less than what I would have spent on a dyson. I have 2 dysons and they worked ok too..but a little too heavy and difficult to use the wand, the unit would fall over while trying to reach higher up places .
customer_reviews.author: kalola

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my daughter and she loved it. This looked brand new and had everything with it. Even the box looked like retail.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Best vaccuum ever
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this vaccuum. Best one I ever had!! Really easy to use: lightweight and swivels great!!! The attachments are easy to put on and use. My floors are so clean and pet hair free. I actually feel bad that my carpet had looked bad before.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Proctor

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I have used my son's snd love it. That was the reason for my purchase. U have an old cat who sheds everywhere like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill M. Meeks

customer_reviews.title: rotator brush problems
customer_reviews.text: the rotator brush quit working the first week I am disappointed as I have used these before and they have been great
customer_reviews.author: Dona B

customer_reviews.title: One of the best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I have fairly new carpet and it gets vacumed a lot. No kids at home either. I was shocked at what it was pulling up....and no it was not carpet fibers. All I can say is this machine is first rate and it out performs the upstairs vaucume we have that was over priced and paid too much for the British plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum Ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm a believer! A commercial that is finally true. I have a Dyson, and this by far out performs it hands down, and at half the price. All the tools are easily accessible, and the versatility is superb! I have and would recommend this to anyone. I can't say enough good about this product. I bought it for the office and several other offices have borrowed it and are also very impressed. If you have any doubts, put them to bed, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MCamps

customer_reviews.title: Language barrier is an electric shock liability
customer_reviews.text: Box and all documentation is in Spanish. Can't read the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy a shark based on the reviews and TV commercials. Great vacuum with great suction.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great suck
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my children haha. Light weight and works great. House gets cleaned in no time!
customer_reviews.author: jeff valencia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Vaccuum!
customer_reviews.text: We have a white lab that is in the house a good part of the time. This vacuum cleans up dog hair like it was never there.
customer_reviews.author: By Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good vacuum if you have pets
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum. Versatile and really does a great job of picking up pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: petite artiste

customer_reviews.title: It's as good as they say it is
customer_reviews.text: Yep! It's as good as they say it is... Only issue now is what should I do with my very expensive Kirby G6!
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best vacums we have ever owned it really has met all of our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: Very, very good machine
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give this a 5 star review? Not light as advertised, it is quite heavy when you place it on the rollers to use. But oath wise it is very good
customer_reviews.author: Carol M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum have ever used. Still learning how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for about 1 month and am amazed at how much cleaner my carpeting is. It really does a great job on pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Carlson

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning machine
customer_reviews.text: I thought I kept a clean house until I used this vacuum. I filled up the canister with just one run throughout the house. I was amazed at how much dirt it pulled up. I am ocd and my house, I thought, was clean. But this vacuum proved me wrong. It works with great ease, and almost drives itself. I have been very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A

customer_reviews.title: Love it and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Fantastic Fantastic. Cannot say enough good things about this vacuum. So easy to put together, first of all, and all of the parts are great! Love the variety. Works on cat litter, small objects, larger objects, just about everything. No bag, super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Kaspar

customer_reviews.title: Great for cat fur
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly on the cat fur all over my rug, but I'm not sure how long it will last given that it hasn't worked as well as the first time since...overall though a great product with awesome extensions!
customer_reviews.author: Talia Wong

customer_reviews.title: Shark Navigator
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with my purchase it was a great buy and works terrific. I would recommend Amazon for quick service and great bargains to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Barrette

customer_reviews.title: The best SHARK ever
customer_reviews.text: Our previous vacuum was a Shark Navigator which was a good product. However, our new Shark Professional surpasses all expectations. It is very easy to use and extremely versatile. The suction power and filtering system is a vast improvement over our last Shark. We especially like the detachable canister with its optional rolling caddy. Shark has outdone themselves on the Professional!!
customer_reviews.author: Antone Sousa

customer_reviews.title: It's great!! believe me my floor is a challenge when it pull all that dirt up. All I can say is wow...
customer_reviews.text: It's great the best vac cleaner I've had in a very long time. My carpet was a great challenge and it pulled all that dirt out of it and no dust in my face...IT"S GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Louetta Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a vacuume the was great with pet hair and multi surfaces. This far exceeded our expectations. It works great. My only complaint is I wish it had a longer hose but the back saver wand makes up for it. It was easy to assemble and reasonably quiet. The suction is amazing and the brush option has a kick so you don't have to work as hard!
customer_reviews.author: Holli Collins

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This Shark 3 in 1 works just as well as the Dyson I own, it came w/ all attachments & cost much less than a Dsyon. I would recommend it to anyone looking to buy a Dyson. Try this Shark first.
customer_reviews.author: Lovegirls

customer_reviews.title: Shark Navigator Professional 3-in-1 Lift Away Rotator
customer_reviews.text: It is way too heavy for someone with a bad back or knee pain, and some one with emphasema beware it is very dusty
customer_reviews.author: Lilipod

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: For the money you just cant beat this. Its just as good as my dyson if not better. Thanks a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuume
customer_reviews.text: Not much to review yet as we have not had a chance to use it more that just a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: W. Zebrow

product_meta.title: Shark Rotator Profesional Lift-Away Hepa 3-in-1 sin Bolsa Upright NV500 Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: Shark Rota-tor Professional Lift Away (NV501) This powerful Never Loses Suction upright vacuum features a unique detachable and portable canister that lifts away for effortless cleaning in and around the home. The extra large capacity dust-cup and Anti-Allergen Complete Seal Technology traps over 99.9 percent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum. Swivel Steering and Cleaner Carpets. Enhanced swivel steering provides the ultimate control to get in and around obstacles and furniture and ultra quiet technology allows for operation anywhere, anytime. The Powerful motorized brush roll can be turned on or off, providing superior performance on both carpets and bare floors. Never Loses Suction upright vacuum features 3 vacuums in one, a powerful upright, a lift-away pod for portable cleaning and a convenient canister vacuum - Extra large capacity dust cup and Anti-Allergen Complete Seal Technology traps over 99.99 percent of dust and allergens inside the vacuum - Ultra-maneuverable swivel steering provides the ultimate control to get in and around obstacles and furniture - Powerful motorized brush roll can be turned on or off, providing superior performance on both carpets and bare floors - Accessories sold separate.
feature_bullets: Shark Anti-Allergen Complete Seal Technology + HEPA Washable Filters
